name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RandomCats - Just random photos of cats :)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you bored? Maybe some happy and cute cats will help you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Would you like to immerse yourself in a delightful world of adorable cats? Give this unique browser extension a try and explore a vast collection of thousands of heartwarming cat photos. Experience the joy and charm of these furry companions like never before!

In the new update you'll be able to play cat-puzzles!!
